reviewText: Hayes and Montomery marry after a whirlwind romance. They seem very happy, but on the way to meet his family it is evident that the groom is an extreme mama's boy.  Not only that , nearly his entire family is caddy and critical. If you have in law problems you will enjoy this one. You may find that yours are not as bad as you thought or realize you're not alone. But you will have some laughs as well, especially from mother. I watched this movie on classic movie channel.
